The byte span where unescaped url path is copied to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Internal.UrlDecoder.DecodeInPlace(System.Span{System.Byte},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unescape a URL path in place.
member.param: The byte span represents a UTF8 encoding url path.
Whether we are doing form encoding or not.
member.returns: The number of the bytes representing the result.
member.remarks: The unescape is done in place, which means after decoding the result is the subset of the input span.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Internal.UrlDecoder.DecodeCore(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Span{System.Byte},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unescape the percent-encodings
member.param: The iterator point to the first % char
The place to write to
The byte array
Whether we are doing form encodoing

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Internal.UrlDecoder.UnescapePercentEncoding(System.Int32@,System.Span{System.Byte},System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Read the percent-encoding and try unescape it.
The operation first peek at the character the iterator points at. If it is % the is then moved on to scan the following to characters. If the two following characters are hexadecimal literals they will be unescaped and the value will be returned.
If the first character is not % the iterator will be removed beyond the location of % and -1 will be returned.
If the following two characters can't be successfully unescaped the iterator will be move behind the % and -1 will be returned.
member.param: The value to read
The byte array
Whether we are decoding a form or not. Will escape '/' if we are doing form encoding
member.returns: The unescaped byte if success. Otherwise return -1.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Internal.UrlDecoder.ReadHex(System.Int32@,System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary:
Read the next char and convert it into hexadecimal value.
The index will be moved to the next byte no matter no matter whether the operation successes.
member.param: The index of the byte in the buffer to read
The byte span from which the hex to be read
member.returns: The hexadecimal value if successes, otherwise -1.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Base64UrlTextEncoder.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes supplied string by replacing the non-URL encodable characters with URL encodable characters and then decodes the Base64 string.
member.param: The string to be decoded.
member.returns: The decoded data.
